title: Getting on track
author: JGray
text:
Dear winter.

Knock it off!

Seriously. Snow. Illnesses. General blah feelings. I'm tired of it.

The weather's starting to warm up, which is good.

Here's the page! Sorry its late. The next one will be up on Thursday as its already in my possession. Keith's faster than I am right now.

What do you think will happen next?

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: I think Chrys is gonna give Theresa a Really Nice Birthday Gift.Whether she's sure she wants it or not.

replies.author: Sensei Le Roof*Guest*
replies.text: Ah, I see she has a machine that goes Ping!
